meanings.definition: Having a powerful effect or influence
meanings.sent1: The impactful speech moved the audience to tears.
meanings.sent2: The new policy had an impactful effect on the company's profits.
meanings.sent3: The impactful fireworks display lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent4: Her impactful presence in the room was like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The impactful storm left a trail of destruction in its wake.

meanings.definition: Producing a strong impression or effect
meanings.sent1: The impactful movie left a lasting impression on the viewers.
meanings.sent2: The artist's work was impactful and thought-provoking.
meanings.sent3: The impactful joke had everyone laughing for hours.
meanings.sent4: His impactful words resonated with the audience long after the speech.
meanings.sent5: The impactful painting captured the essence of the scene perfectly.

meanings.definition: Capable of making a significant impact
meanings.sent1: The impactful decision changed the course of the project.
meanings.sent2: The impactful donation helped many families in need.
meanings.sent3: The impactful invention revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent4: Her impactful actions spoke louder than words.
meanings.sent5: The impactful discovery opened up new possibilities for research.
